channel.title: Hugo Whisper Docs on Hugo Whisper Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo Whisper Docs on Hugo Whisper Theme

item.title: Install Hugo
item.description: To use this theme you will need to have Hugo installed. If you don’t already have Hugo installed please follow the official installation guide Check Hugo Version This theme uses Hugo Pipes to compile SCSS and minify assets.

item.title: Install Theme
item.description: Create a new Hugo site hugo new site mynewsite This will create a fresh Hugo site in the folder mynewsite. Install theme Copy or git clone this theme into the sites themes folder mynewsite/themes

item.title: Configuration
item.description: Syntax highlighting and menus can be configured via config.toml.

item.title: Specimen
item.description: Markdown Test Page Headings Paragraphs Blockquotes Lists Horizontal rule Table Code Inline elements Headings Heading one Sint sit cillum pariatur eiusmod nulla pariatur ipsum. Sit laborum anim qui mollit tempor pariatur nisi minim dolor.

item.title: Hugo Whisper
item.description: Whisper is a minimal documentation theme built for Hugo. The design & functionality is intentionally minimal.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.

item.title: Placeholder Text
item.description: Lorem est tota propiore conpellat pectoribus de pectora summo.

item.title: Math Typesetting
item.description: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.

item.title: Checking syscalls with different batch sizes
item.description: Ozone Performance #7: Checking syscalls with different batch sizes Date: 2020-02-11 Ozone master: 3ddcdbbef Ratis master: 0.5.0-90cd474-SNAPSHOT Docker image: elek/ozonedev:20200211-1 How to test? Deploy a single Datanode which is forced to be in FOLLOWER mode.

item.title: Storage class support in Ozone
item.description: Abstract One of the fundamental abstraction of Ozone is the Container which used as the unit of the replication. Containers have to favors: Open and Closed containers: Open containers are replicated by Ratis and writable, Closed containers are replicated with data copy and read only.
